settings.content: Elevate Your Home Gym - Customizable, Compact, Flexible, Engineered for Peak Performance.

settings.f_content:
• 11 to 66 lbs per adjustable dumbbell
  • Sold as a Pair
  • Weight Range: Effortlessly adjust from 11 to 66 lbs for each dumbbell.
  • Sold Individually: Tailor your set to your space and budget needs.
  • Comprehensive: Replaces the need for 12 sets of weights.
  • Quick Selection: State-of-the-art Dial Tech for swift weight changes.
  • Safe & Compact: Space-efficient design with a secure base for confident handling.
  • Full-Spectrum Training: Accommodates all fitness levels and exercises.
  • Incremental Adjustments: Fine-tune your workout with 5 lb increments.
  • Durability Meets Design: Laser-cut steel plates and a reinforced structure ensure lasting use.
  • Enhanced Experience: The tactile pleasure of our dial system offers a satisfying twist to your training routine.
In stock orders will typically ship within 3-5 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped.

Liberty insurance coverage
We are partnered up with Liberty Insurance to cover injuries due to product faults or misfunctions during your training up to 4 million (Coverage is limited to dumbbell products purchased from Ativafit website)

• Please adjust weights on the trays for safety.
  • Make sure to press down the red safety button completely and have the arrow pointed exactly to the desired weight number.
  • Please do not drop or throw weights after use.

settings.heading: Strength. Flexibility.Endurance. All in one.
settings.context: - The ultimate home gym in a box.
settings.span_b3: Dial Tech: Quick and precise weight adjustments

settings.slidetext: Adjust from a beginner-friendly 11 lbs to a challenging 66 lbs, suitable for a variety of workouts, from light toning to intensive strength training.
Seamlessly shift between weights in 5 lb increments, offering 12 different weight settings, allowing for precise load adjustment to match your workout intensity.
Made with a combination of heavy-duty steel and reinforced plastic, these dumbbells are engineered for long-term durability and resilience against wear and tear.
Incorporating a dual-lock mechanism, the dumbbells ensure a secure hold of weight plates during workouts, providing stability and preventing accidental release.
With dimensions of 16.3"L x 7.9"W x 8.3"H, these adjustable dumbbells occupy minimal space, equivalent to a shoebox, saving valuable floor space in your home gym.

settings.heading: Ativafit Through the Lens of Influencers
settings.text: What Influencers Are Saying About Ativafit Dumbbells, Experience the fusion of innovation and fitness with every lift.

settings.heading: Flex Your Fitness: Anywhere, Anytime
settings.subheading: A Powerhouse for Your Home Gym
settings.scene_text_01: The 66lb dumbbells are heavy enough to challenge even the most experienced lifters. They're perfect for compound exercises like squats, deadlifts, and bench presses, which work multiple muscle groups at once.
settings.scene_text_02: The adjustable weight range allows you to target specific muscle groups with isolation exercises like bicep curls, tricep extensions, and shoulder raises.
settings.scene_text_03: 66lb dumbbells can be used to perform functional exercises like dumbbell swings, clean and presses, and box jumps. These exercises are great for improving your overall fitness and athleticism.
settings.scene_text_04: The 66lb dumbbells can be used to add intensity to your cardio workouts. Try doing dumbbell swings, cleans, or presses for intervals to burn calories and improve your cardiovascular health.
settings.scene_text_05: High-intensity interval training (HIIT) is a great way to burn fat and improve your fitness. The 66lb dumbbells can be used to perform HIIT exercises like dumbbell burpees, snatches, or jerk.

settings.question: What is the weight range of the Ativafit 66lb dumbbells?
settings.answer: The weight range of the Ativafit 66lb dumbbells is 11-66lbs. This means that they are suitable for a wide range of fitness levels, from beginners to advanced lifters.

settings.question: How do I adjust the weight of the Ativafit 66lb dumbbells?
settings.answer: The Ativafit 66lb dumbbells use a Dial Tech system to adjust the weight. To adjust the weight, simply turn the dial on the side of the dumbbell until the desired weight is displayed.

settings.question: Are the Ativafit 66lb dumbbells durable?
settings.answer: Yes, the Ativafit 66lb dumbbells are very easy to use. The Dial Tech system is simple to operate, and the dumbbells are compact and lightweight, making them easy to store and transport.

settings.question: Are the Ativafit 66lb dumbbells easy to use?
settings.answer: Yes, the Ativafit 66lb dumbbells are very easy to use. The Dial Tech system is simple to operate, and the dumbbells are compact and lightweight, making them easy to store and transport.

settings.question: What are some of the benefits of using 66lb dumbbells?
settings.answer:
Ativafit 66lb dumbbells offer a variety of benefits, including:
a. Versatility: Dumbbells can be used for a wide range of exercises, including strength training, cardio, and rehabilitation.
b. Affordability: The dumbbells are a relatively affordable option for a complete home gym.
c. Compact design: The dumbbells are compact and lightweight, making them easy to store and transport.

settings.question: What happens if my dumbbells arrive damaged?
settings.answer: We're confident in the quality of our Ativafit dumbbells, but in the unlikely event they arrive damaged, please reach out to our customer service team within 12 hours of delivery. We'll quickly process a replacement or refund depending on your preference. Remember to have photos of the damage handy for faster assistance.

settings.question: Can I return or exchange my dumbbells after purchase?
settings.answer: Absolutely! We offer a 30-day return window for unused and undamaged Ativafit dumbbells. Simply contact customer service to initiate the return process and receive a prepaid return label. Please note that there may be a restocking fee depending on the reason for return.

settings.question: What does the 2-year warranty cover on the dumbbells?
settings.answer: Our 2-year warranty covers any manufacturing defects or malfunctions with the dumbbells themselves. This includes issues with the Dial Tech weight adjustment mechanism, the plates, or the internal structure. Normal wear and tear, damage from accidents or misuse, and cosmetic imperfections are not covered. If you believe your dumbbells fall under the warranty, contact us and we'll be happy to help!

settings.question: What's the deal with the "Protection Plan"?
settings.answer: Our Ativafit Protection Plan, offered through Liberty Insurance, provides additional peace of mind by covering accidental injuries caused by product faults or malfunctions during your training. This coverage goes above and beyond the standard warranty and offers up to $4 million in protection. It's a great option for people who want extra security when using their Ativafit dumbbells.
